title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.12 - Disposing of cremains
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.12 - Disposing of cremains

State Regulations

The cremains, enclosed in the manner prescribed by sections
203.10 and
203.11
of this Part, shall be
disposed of in strict accordance with the direction of the person in control of
disposition of the remains as set forth in the cremation authorization form, and in accordance with the provisions of section
4202
(4)
of the Public Health

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
